name: Malfunction (itch) (grimrictusgames)
description:
Following a catastrophe on Earth, you were one a of the lucky million to make it off.

Catastrophe followed you.

(Thanks to Kitsch Digital for hosting Scream Jam 2021, as you might imagine, time was a bit short here (10 days!), so the game is a bit lacking in many departments. If the jam rules allow, I will be adding patches to this to add back a lot of the missing content and genrally just tidying and prettying it up a bit.)
